Description: QTParted is a Partition Magic clone written in C++ using the Qt toolkit.

Very special thanks to: First of all i want to thank Andrew Clausen, the author of parted, for his support. For more info about parted and libparted: http://www.gnu.org/software/parted
I must to thank also François Dupoux that choosed to help me with "all this crazy stuff" :)
At the end i want to thank http://www.suse.it that send me him wonderful suse 8.2 distrubution.
Warning: QTParted is still in development, if you experienced any kind of problem with latest release please try also the version left before!
Please, ask questions in the forums.
Merci de poster les questions, suggestions ou autres remarques dans les forums.
You can report bugs. With our bug management system (mantis), you will need to create an user account before.
Vous pouvez soumettre un bug. Notre gestionnaire de bugs (Mantis) nécessite la création d'un compte utilisateur pour fonctionner.
